Hi,

if you are interested in analyzing and synthesizing tide curves, you should check out the new version of TideCurves.
Version 0.0.5 is now on CRAN <https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/TideCurves/index.html> 

Main changes are:

* Introducing two new exported functions: BuildTC() & SynTC(). Please see examples and README.
* Added a new internal function BuildDesign().


The package is on also available on github: <https://github.com/moritzmn/TideCurves>

Best,
Moritz
